title: 1. TO-DO Web App
description: A distraction-free web app to help you focus on creating and completing Tasks.(A basic TODO APP)

title: 2. Portfolio Web App
description: A website built entirely in Python to showcase coding projects and apps.

title: 3. Astronomy Image of the day Web App
description: A website where every day a different astronomy Image of the day gets displayed along with it's information.

title: 4. Visualizing Weather Forecast Web App
description: A data web app that visualizes the weather forecast for the next five days of any city.

title: 5. PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines. (NOT A GUI APP)

title: 6. PDF Invoices
description: A script that reads invoice records from Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices. (NOT A GUI APP)

title: 7. Positive News Site
description: A website that gets data from a news API and uses sentiment analysis to publish only positive news. (NOT A GUI APP)

title: 8. Weather API
description: A REST API built with Python and Flask to serve historical weather data for various cities.

title: Download Cleaner
description: A script that monitors the Downloads folder and deletes old files keeping the folder clean.

title: Tour Scraper
description: A program that checks a music band's website and sends an email when there are new tours.

title: Helper Chatbot
description: A chatbot that knows about a specific topic and answers questions regarding that topic.

title: Open Domain Chatbot
description: A chatbot built that can discuss anything with a human and is built using the Facebook API.

title: Webcam Motion Detector
description: A program that monitors the computer webcam and sends an email when a new object enters the view.

title: Typing Analyzer
description: A program that monitors the computer keyboard and returns the most typed words of the session.

title: Internet Speed Analysis
description: A program that records the internet speed every few seconds and plots the values on the browser.

title: Monitoring Data
description: A program that monitors a particular website and periodically records the data to a remote server.

title: Visualizing Data
description: A program that visualizes the data collected in the previous monitoring program.

title: Student Management System
description: A desktop PyQt6 GUI app for managing university student data with an SQL database backend.

title: School Management System
description: A desktop PyQt6 GUI app for managing complex university data with an SQL database backend.

title: Restaurant Menu Web App
description: A Django web app to let customers see a restaurant menu and meal availability.

title: Online Store
description: A Django online store app where users can place orders and sellers can manage them.
